movies.title: Maravillas
movies.plot: Maravillas, a teenager of fifteen, lives with her father, an old unemployed photographer who steals money from his daughter for his little erotic vices. But Maravillas has the protection of their godparents, Jews of Sephardic origin. When an emerald disappears, the prime suspect will be the father of the girl.
movies.simplePlot: Maravillas, a teenager of fifteen, lives with her father, an old unemployed photographer who steals money from his daughter for his little erotic vices. But Maravillas has the protection of...

biography.bio: Spanish actor and director of cinema and theater. Son of the actress Carola Fernán Gómez. When he was three years old he comes back to Spain from Argentina. He has written comedies, novels and poem books. He plays a wide repertoire of roles from comedy to drama.
biography.name: Fernando Fernán Gómez

biography.bio: Cristina Marcos was born on December 19, 1963 in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. She is an actress, known for High Heels (1991), The Red Squirrel (1993) and The Boarding School (2007).
biography.name: Cristina Marcos

biography.bio: Enrique San Francisco was born on March 10, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as Enrique San Francisco Cobo. He is an actor, known for Cuéntame (2001), The Hit (1984) and La crisis carnívora (2007).
biography.name: Enrique San Francisco

biography.bio: Francisco Merino was born on September 11, 1931 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain. He is an actor, known for El Sur (1983), Démons dans le jardin (1982) and Going Down in Morocco (1989).
biography.name: Francisco Merino

biography.bio: León Klimovsky was born on October 16, 1906 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as León Klimovsky Dulfano. He was a director and writer, known for The Werewolf Versus the Vampire Woman (1971), Leap to Fame (1959) and The Vampires Night Orgy (1973). He was married to Inés de Tolosa. He died on April 8, 1996 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: León Klimovsky

biography.bio: Eduardo MacGregor is an actor, known for Simon du désert (1965), Dragón Rapide (1986) and El Jeremías (2015).
biography.name: Eduardo MacGregor

biography.bio: Gérard Tichy was born on March 11, 1920 in Weißenfels, Germany as Gerhard Johannes Alexander Tichy Wondzinski. He was an actor, known for Doctor Zhivago (1965), Le Cid (1961) and The Blancheville Monster (1963). He died on April 11, 1992 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Gérard Tichy

biography.bio: George Rigaud was born on August 11, 1905 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Pedro Jorge Rigato Delissetche. He was an actor, known for Horror Express (1972), Cerca de las estrellas (1962) and July 14 (1933). He died on January 17, 1984 in Leganés, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: George Rigaud

biography.bio: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri' was born in 1965 in Madrid, Spain as José Luis Fernández Eguia. He was an actor, known for The Hit (1984), Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985) and El pico 2 (1984). He died on May 9, 1988 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri'

biography.bio: Miguel Molina was born on November 27, 1963 in Madrid, Spain as Miguel Ángel Molina Tejedor. He is an actor, known for La loi du désir (1987), Ana y los 7 (2002) and Código natural (2000). He was previously married to Lydia Bosch and Kirsa van Pallandt.
biography.name: Miguel Molina

biography.bio: Yolanda Medina is an actress, known for Maravillas (1981) and Buscando a Perico (1982).
biography.name: Yolanda Medina

biography.placeOfBirth: Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain
biography.bio: José Manuel Cervino was born on October 29, 1940 in Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain as José Manuel Cervino Almeida. He is an actor, known for La guerra de los locos (1987), The Last Circus (2010) and Mararía (1998). He has been married to Maite Blasco since 1977.
biography.name: José Manuel Cervino

biography.bio: Charo Zapardiel is an actress, known for Sex and Lucia (2001), El comisario (1999) and The Sleeping Voice (2011).
biography.name: Charo Zapardiel

biography.bio: Paco Catalá is an actor, known for Periodistas (1998), Campeones (1997) and Goya in Bordeaux (1999).
biography.name: Paco Catalá

biography.bio: Juan Jesús Valverde was born in Arenas de San Pedro, Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain. He is an actor, known for Arrayán (2001), Le maître d'escrime (1992) and The Contestant (2007).
biography.name: Juan Jesús Valverde

categories.category: Best Spanish Movie Performer (Mejor intérprete de cine español)
